content.raw:
We've noticed that the force torque values reported for the hands consistently flip signs for all value other than Force z.

Just launch atlas utils atlas_sandia_hands.launch and look at the force torque outputs.  Also, the torque values in the feet and hands seem incorrect to us, but this may be due to their frame of reference (on the talus instead of the foot).  

Also, the DRC User Guide needs a clear explanaition of the origin, frame of reference, and expected values for these sensors because after looking through Gazebo answers, lots of people are confused about the values coming out of these sensors.
content.html:
We've noticed that the force torque values reported for the hands consistently flip signs for all value other than Force z.

Just launch atlas utils atlas_sandia_hands.launch and look at the force torque outputs. Also, the torque values in the feet and hands seem incorrect to us, but this may be due to their frame of reference (on the talus instead of the foot).

Also, the DRC User Guide needs a clear explanaition of the origin, frame of reference, and expected values for these sensors because after looking through Gazebo answers, lots of people are confused about the values coming out of these sensors.
